wikipedia_page.main: Sir George Johnson  (29 November 1818 – 3 June 1896) was an eminent English physician who became recognized as an authority on cholera and kidney diseases.  Some of his theories are no longer accepted today.

response: *Sir George Johnson (1818–1896), eminent physician who became recognized as an authority on cholera and kidney diseases, was born in Goudhurst.
